channel.title: Cat Not Following Correctly?
channel.description:
Hi, for some reason I cannot get my hellcat to follow correctly, I think something is wrong with his WalkingType.
When I added my cat, it never kept up with me. But I logged into my server the next day when 17 were online and the NPCs were twitching. I noticed when the NPCs were twitching the cat followed me perfect and kept up with me. Anyone know why this happens?

item.title: Cat Not Following Correctly?
item.dc:creator: @Halflingblade Halflingblade
item.description:
@Halflingblade wrote:

Hi, for some reason I cannot get my hellcat to follow correctly, I think something is wrong with his WalkingType.
